title: Automated Capacitor Bank Switching
description: The DMS automatically switches capacitor banks on a feeder to manage reactive power and improve voltage.

tasks.description: Monitor real-time power factor on the feeder.
tasks.expected_outcome: System gathers live power factor readings.

tasks.description: The system detects a low power factor, indicating a need for reactive power support.
tasks.expected_outcome: System identifies the need to switch on a capacitor bank.

tasks.description: Send a command to close the switch for the optimal capacitor bank to bring the power factor closer to unity.
tasks.expected_outcome: System successfully operates the capacitor bank switch.
